item.title: A How-to guide for migrating legacy data applications
item.description:
Description

Migrating legacy applications can be daunting. They are frequently large, poorly tested, undermaintained, yet business critical. Over time they may end up relying on deprecated technology and unprepared for changing business needs. Weâ€™ll cover lessons learned in migrating such an application to something maintainable, sharing details on how to go about it in a safe and systematic manner.
item.dc:creator: Marius van Niekerk
